com.github.koraktor.mavanagaiata.git

Class GitTagDescription

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.koraktor.mavanagaiata.git.GitTagDescription

  • public class GitTagDescription
extends Object
    Represents information about a Git commit like supplied by git describe
    Author:
    Sebastian Staudt

    • Field Summary

      protected String abbreviatedCommitId 
      protected GitCommit commit 
      protected int distance 
      protected GitTag nextTag

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getNextTagName()
      Returns the name of the next reachable tag
      String toString()
      Returns the string representation of this description This includes the abbreviated commit ID and (if available) the distance to and the name of the next tag.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GitTagDescription

        public GitTagDescription(GitRepository repository,
                 GitCommit commit,
                 GitTag nextTag,
                 int distance)
                  throws GitRepositoryException
        Create a new description for the given information
        Parameters:
        repository - The repository which contains the commit
        commit - The commit
        nextTag - The next tag reachable from the commit
        distance - The distance to the next tag
        Throws:
        GitRepositoryException - if the commit can not be resolved

        public String toString()
        Returns the string representation of this description

        This includes the abbreviated commit ID and (if available) the distance to and the name of the next tag.
